head.title: A Vase for Your Light Bulb

hedline.hl1: A Vase for Your Light Bulb

abstract.p: Currents column on new lighting fixtures by Philippe Starck; photo (S)

block.p: Here's a crystal chandelier with a difference. Philippe Starck's Cicatrices ceiling fixtures, right, by Flos, are made up of cut-crystal vases attached to sheets of tempered glass. (The cuts remind Mr. Starck of scars; cicatrices is French for scars.) The chandeliers come with three or five vases on one level, or eight vases stacked on three shelves; prices are $2,070 to $3,950. A floor lamp with one cut-crystal vase has a 51-inch high chrome base; $780. Available at Cassina, 155 East 56th Street in Manhattan; or www.flos.net for other locations.
